item.title: How I Built a Twitter Bot using Python and AWS Lambda
item.description: Last year I built a (very silly) Twitter bot to track the name changes of Nahim (@nah_im_abdulla). I hosted it locally for the best part of the year but decided to move it to the cloud for reliability. If my computer stops working, the bot goes down but that is less likely with AWS. Create a Twitter account and app First, I signed up for Twitter using the username NahimName for the bot.
